articles.description: Maruti Suzuki has launched the 2022 Maruti S-Presso with New K-Series 1.0L Dual Jet, Dual VVT engine with Idle-Start-Stop Technology. The new model is available in 4 trim levels – Std, LXi, Vxi and Vxi – priced between Rs 4.25 lakh and Rs 5.99 lakh. It also c…
